description: The classic McDouble速 burger stacks two 100% pure beef patties seasoned with just a pinch of salt and pepper. Wondering what the difference is between a McDouble速 and a Double Cheeseburger? A slice of cheese! It's topped with tangy pickles, chopped onions, ketchup, mustard and a melty slice of American cheese.
